summary: This mod gives shields to Winterhold guards.
descriptionHtml:
By: I forgot my name; sorry for the inconvenience

--------------------------------------------------------
On my quest to collect shields from each of the 9 holds, 
I discovered that Winterhold is too cheap to buy shields. 
Afterwards I slaughtered the entire town. This mod will give 
Winterhold the funds to buy shields.


tl;dr Winterhold guards have shields.
----------------------------

Bugs: Guards don\'t like to equip shields, they\'re still lootable, of course.
-----------------------------

Thanks to foretrenty for his NPC Editor 
which allowed me to make the adjustments.

Downloadable here: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?
author: Carroto
